meanings.definition: A person or thing that degrades.
meanings.sent1: The degraders in the movie made the main character feel sad.
meanings.sent2: The degraders in the factory were causing harm to the environment.
meanings.sent3: The degraders in the story were like villains trying to ruin everything.
meanings.sent4: The degraders of happiness seemed to lurk around every corner.
meanings.sent5: The degraders of confidence whispered negative thoughts in her ear.

meanings.sent1: She counted the degraders in the room and found there were five.
meanings.sent2: The degraders gathered together to discuss their plans.
meanings.sent3: The degraders looked like a group of troublemakers up to no good.
meanings.sent4: The degraders stood out in the crowd, each with a mischievous glint in their eyes.
meanings.sent5: The degraders marched in unison, a force to be reckoned with.
